name: Shorin-Ryu Katas (Beginner & Advanced)
description:
This page provides details about Shorin-Ryu kata. There are 18 traditional non-weapon katas in Shorin-Ryu Karate. In addition, this Karate style uses weapon katas (i.e. Bo katas). These videos and instructions will help you to master the Shorin-Ryu katas for your next belt test.

You should also read our section on Is Kata Useful or Useless? It discusses the pros & cons of kata. If you are looking for the katas of other Karate styles (i.e. Shotokan or Wado-Ryu), visit the main Katas & Forms section.

Wiki – Best Karate Books
